herosection.paragraph1: In the fast-paced and ever-evolving world of technology, finding skilled and knowledgeable professionals is crucial for the success of anybusiness. Pulse Coding emerges as a game-changer in the recruitment landscape, providing employers with a unique opportunity to tap into apool of highly qualified candidates without the burden of hefty recruitment fees.
herosection.paragraph2: Pulse Coding is an innovative platform that specializes in training and developing coding talents, equipping them with the technical knowledge and skills needed to thrive in today's competitive tech industry. Graduates from Pulse Coding bring a fresh perspective and awealth of expertise, making them valuable assets for companies seeking to enhance their technical workforce. One of the key advantages of hiring Pulse Coding graduates is the assurance of technical proficiency. The program is designed to cover a comprehensive range of coding  languages, frameworks, and tools, ensuring that graduates possess a well-rounded skill set. Whether it's front-end development, back-end  programming, or full-stack expertise, Pulse Coding graduates are well-prepared to contribute effectively to a variety of projects.
herosection.paragraph3: Moreover, Pulse Coding places a strong emphasis on real-world applications and hands-on experience. Through practical projects and industry relevant simulations, students gain a deep understanding of how to apply their coding skills in practical scenarios. This practical exposure distinguishes Pulse Coding graduates from conventional candidates, as they enter the workforce with a robust foundation and a readiness to tackle complex challenges

faqs.question: Creativity & Quality
faqs.answer: Our training encourages creative thinking and emphasizes the importance of quality in software engineering. We believe that a combination of creativity and quality craftsmanship leads to effective software solutions.

faqs.question: Teamwork & Innovation
faqs.answer: Teamwork and innovation are core values in our training programs. We cultivate effective teamwork skills through collaborative projects, fostering an environment that encourages innovation and industry best practices.

faqs.question: Agency Experience
faqs.answer: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its letter smaking it look like readable English.

faqs.question: Empathy in Action Simplicity
faqs.answer: We instill a sense of empathy in our training, encouraging students to understand end-users' needs. We focus on creating user-friendly and accessible software solutions through simplicity in design and functionality.

bootcampSection.heading: Bootcamp
bootcampSection.text: Welcome to an inclusive online education platform that caters to learners of all backgrounds, levels, and aspirations. Our platform is designed to be accessible, flexible, and adaptable, making it the perfect choice for everyone, regardless of age or prior educational experience.
bootcampSection.text2: Our next course commences on Monday 19th February 2024. Pay a £750 deposit and £271 a month for 24 months with interest-free finance.

aboutCourseSection.title: About This Course

aboutCourseSection.subtitle: This bootcamp is for you if you...

features.title: Flexible Learning
features.desc: Study on your terms with self-paced courses, allowing you to learn when it suits you best

features.title: Expert Instructors
features.desc: Learn from professionals and experts in their respective fields, ensuring high-quality education

features.title: Interactive Community
features.desc: Engage with a diverse community of learners, fostering discussions, collaboration, and peer learning.

curricullumSection.header: What you'll learn in this web development bootcamp
curricullumSection.text: Master the technical and project-management skills needed for a successful career in tech, learning how to develop great products in teams using modern workflows.

Prepwork.subtitle: Preparation work
Prepwork.desc: Our web development course is very intense. To be prepared and make the most out of the bootcamp, you must complete 4¼ hours of preparation work to give you basic tech foundations and culture.

smallsubtitle1.header: What you will do in practice
components: Online quiz to validate basic tech knowledge

smallsubtitle2.header: Software and languages you will learn

Foundations.subtitle: HTML and CSS Foundations
Foundations.desc: Throughout this course, participants will delve into the fundamental building blocks of web development - HTML (HyperText Markup Language) and CSS (Cascading Style Sheets).

components: Interactive coding exercises for practical application

JS Fundamentals.subtitle: JavaScript Fundamentals
JS Fundamentals.desc: Throughout this course, participants will embark on a learning journey that covers essential topics and hands-on exercises aimed at building a solid foundation in JavaScript.

Frontend Frameworks.subtitle: Frontend Frameworks and Libraries
Frontend Frameworks.desc: In this course, participants will delve into various frontend frameworks, which are comprehensive libraries or tools that streamline the process of developing interactive and responsive web applications.

components: Build interactive user interfaces from scratch

Backend Development.desc: In a Backend Development course, learners will delve into the following key aspects:

card1.text: Pay your course fees over 12 or 24 monthly instalments at 0% APR. In partnership with EdAid

callToActionSection.text: Still Confused About Your Career Choices? Consult with Our Experts

heroSection.title: Your Gateway to Top Companies
heroSection.desc: Explore the essential skills needed to thrive in the tech industry through our comprehensive bootcamp.
heroSection.text1: Join our bootcamp and position yourself for exciting opportunities
heroSection.text2: Open doors to collaborations with leading companies in the tech ecosystem.

heroSection.title: Intro
heroSection.desc: Gain a basic understanding of JavaScript - one of the most sought after programming languages in the tech industry
heroSection.text1: Our INTRO course is completely FREE
heroSection.text2: Get started now on your journey into Software development

reasonToTakeCourseSection.desc: Embark on a journey into JavaScript excellence and elevate your coding prowess with our comprehensive course

reason.title: Building a Strong Foundation
reason.desc: An introductory JavaScript course provides a solid foundation for understanding the core concepts of programming, helping learners build a strong base for advanced coding skills.

reason.title: Versatility in Web Development
reason.desc: JavaScript is a versatile language used for both front-end and back-end web development. Learning the basics opens the door to creating dynamic and interactive websites.

reason.title: In-Demand Skill in the Job Market
reason.desc: JavaScript skills are highly sought after in the job market. Taking an introductory course enhances your employability and opens up opportunities in the tech industry.

reason.title: Enhancing Problem-Solving Skills
reason.desc: Programming challenges in an intro to JavaScript course help develop problem-solving skills. Learners gain the ability to break down complex problems into manageable tasks.

reason.title: Interactive Web Experiences
reason.desc: JavaScript is instrumental in creating interactive elements on websites. Understanding its fundamentals enables you to add engaging features and improve user experiences.

reason.title: Preparation for Advanced Programming
reason.desc: Intro to JavaScript serves as a stepping stone for learning other programming languages and technologies, preparing learners for more advanced and specialized areas in software development.

callToActionSection.text: Still Confused About Your Career Choices? Consult with Our Experts

heroSection.title: Get your dream job with our career services
heroSection.desc: Our Career services will get you ready to land a job in tech through personal coaching and network of 1000+ hiring partners

careerserviceSection.title: Our Career services will be here for you

cards.title: Benefit from one on one coaching
cards.desc: Meet our Career team for a 1:1 to help guide you in your career path and review your application strategy and documents.

cards.title: Meet out Hiring network
cards.desc: We have more than 985 hiring partners. We organize regular recruiting events where you can speak directly to company representatives and share regular job offers between alumni.

cards.title: Get job offers by our Alumni
cards.desc: You’ll be part of a global community with 24,000 Alumni worldwide with lifetime access to Pulse Coding alumni slack channel.

cards.title: Get access to Pulse Coding content
cards.desc: You will have access to Pulse Coding career and course resources for life, including a selection of top PERKS with 30+ companies including AWS, Angolia, Go Rails.

eventsSection.title: Attend dedicated Pulse Coding hiring events
eventsSection.desc: Through job fairs, networking and get me hired events and talks, our careers team will introduce you to the right hiring partner - depending on your goal, your project, and your dream job.

ContactFormSection.desc: Reach out to us with any question, inquiries or collaboration opportunities. we're here to listen and respond promptly
ContactFormSection.subtitle: Reach Out to Us
